summary: THIS MOD INCLUDES 3 EPIC THINGS READ DESCRIPTION
descriptionHtml:
okay first off this is my first mod, but i know for sure it works it has been tested on latest version of skyrim (1.8) you can just drag the file to data folder or use nexus manager your choice !

Update for mod coming soon

Here are some tweaks becoming available in the next update

- Fully red Chris 
- fix for making Chris follow
- updated jail clothing 
- updated dialogue ( might not happen )
- much more ! ( if have any more ideas too add to the mod comment right below! )


this mod includes:

- when you go to whiterun jail instead of wearing those old rags you wear a hat and shoes with the rags (unfortunately yes with the rags working on something else you can wear so send requests in the comments)

- also includes if you never talked to ulfric storm-cloak about joining the storm-cloak legion go to him and ask him about it he will say a funny dialogue ! with voice if you already talked to him just keep you save and make another one just to hear the funny dialogue ! 

- ultimate child mod ! (yes ultimate child mod prob wondering what the heck that is)
ultimate child mod is a huge child bigger then reg people but smaller then giants that have red skin and can follow you (if you do all jarl requests or set relationship to 100) he is super fast when he runs and he carries tremendous amount of loot if he dies ! look at screen shots for more 

- if you are having any problems please just comment down below and i will get back to you  as soon as possible... just like i said this is the beta of the ultimate skyrim mod there will be more to the mod in less than a week ! so keep on checking !   

[b][u]Installation[/u][/b]

- [b][u]Download manually[/u][/b] : Drag the .esp file into Steam->Steamapps->Skyrim->Data 
- Run the game and make sure you have it enabled/checked off on [b][u]Data files[/u][/b]
- [b][u]Nexus Mod Manager[/u][/b] : Download the mod and open it with nexus mod manager, then let it download (you can see the progress on the bottom of program), once it downloaded you can enable it under [b][u]Mods[/u][/b] enable it, then check it so all the add-ons are turned on
- Have fun

[b][u]Where the epic child can be found[/u][/b]

- Dragon Reach in Whiterun
- Ulfric is in Windhelm
- Special cothes anytime you go to Whiterun jail


- thanks for downloading !
author: Joseph_Tento
